mapper.select: SELECT mp.mentor_email, mp.about_mentor, mp.specialized_position, mp.specialized_champion, mp.contact_time, mp.careers, mp.recom_ment FROM mentor_profile AS mp JOIN mentor_tag AS mt ON mp.mentor_email = mt.mentor_email WHERE mt.tag_id IN (SELECT tag_id FROM menti_tag WHERE menti_email = #{menti_email}) GROUP BY mp.mentor_email HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT mt.tag_id) >= 2 ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT mt.tag_id) desc LIMIT 5;

SELECT cm.menti_email , cm.summoner_name , cm.position_to_learn , cm.champion_to_learn , cm.target_tier FROM custom_mentor AS cm JOIN menti_tag AS mt ON cm.menti_email = mt.menti_email WHERE mt.tag_id IN (SELECT tag_id FROM mentor_tag WHERE mentor_email = #{mentor_email}) GROUP BY cm.menti_email HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT mt.tag_id) >= 2 ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT mt.tag_id) desc;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO custom_mentor (menti_email, summoner_name, position_to_learn, champion_to_learn, target_tier) VALUES (#{menti_email},#{summoner_name},#{position_to_learn},#{champion_to_learn},#{target_tier});
